overview: Michel, reporter, finally joins his old isolated cottage in the middle of a park, having spent two years away from home. Our protagonist hopes to regain some serenity, but he does not arrive at the best moment: he did not expect the suicide attempt of Catherine, the wife of his brother Arthur

production_companies.name: Centre du Cinéma et de l'Audiovisuel de la FWB

title: Red Haired Revolver
